attributes.action: Stop the Islam UK march on Wooton Basset
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Islam march on Wooton Basset would be a national disgrace. It would be an insult to our all of our troops, especially the 100 + who have lost their lives. (And still rising)Our troops have been sent by this goverment to far off Islamic countries in the so called name of anti terrorisim and democracy. The troops are doing their bit, how about this goverment showing some metal in our own country and supporting our troops and our democracy. Enough is Enough, lets stand up and be counted people of the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
